name: Invesco S&P 500 Revenue ETF
description: The Invesco S&P 500 Revenue ETF (RWO) is an exchange-traded fund that seeks to track the performance of the S&P 500 Revenue-Weighted Index. Launched in 2010, RWO offers investors an innovative way to gain exposure to the largest U.S. companies based on their revenue rather than market capitalization. This approach allows the fund to emphasize companies that generate higher revenues, providing a different perspective on the U.S. equity market. The ETF includes a diverse range of sectors, including technology, healthcare, consumer discretionary, and financials, thus ensuring a broad exposure to the U.S. economy. RWO is designed for investors looking for a transparent, cost-effective investment vehicle that can complement traditional market-cap-weighted strategies. The fund has a relatively low expense ratio, making it an attractive option for cost-conscious investors. As part of Invesco's suite of ETFs, RWO is backed by a robust reputation and operational expertise, providing an accessible means for both retail and institutional investors to participate in the market. Through its revenue-weighted methodology, RWO may also offer a degree of downside protection during market downturns, as it tends to focus on companies with strong revenue streams. Overall, RWO represents a strategic investment choice for those looking to diversify their portfolios while capitalizing on the performance of revenue-leading U.S. companies.

seo.meta_title: Invesco S&P 500 Revenue ETF (RWO) | Invest in Revenue-Weighted Companies
seo.meta_description: Explore Invesco S&P 500 Revenue ETF (RWO), which offers exposure to the largest U.S. companies based on revenue. Invest in a cost-effective, innovative ETF to diversify your portfolio.

faq.question: What is the Invesco S&P 500 Revenue ETF?
faq.answer: The Invesco S&P 500 Revenue ETF (RWO) tracks the performance of the S&P 500 Revenue-Weighted Index, focusing on companies by their revenue.

faq.question: What is the investment strategy of RWO?
faq.answer: RWO uses a revenue-weighted methodology, emphasizing companies with higher revenues rather than market capitalization.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Invesco?
faq.answer: Marty Flanagan is the CEO of Invesco.

faq.question: Where is Invesco headquartered?
faq.answer: Invesco is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, USA.
